content: dog walk fingerless mittens by karousel knitting 1 overview these timeless cozy fingerless mittens are as practical as they are beautiful with a neat thumb gusset and clean lines they re perfect for fall walks morning coffee runs or anyone who loves to keep their hands warm while still using their fingers freely a great way to use up those last pieces of yarn so nothing goes to waste sizes womens w s- m -l mens m s- m -l circumference womens w 147- 168 -189 mm mens m 210- 231 -252 mm yarn 10-15 grams of drops flora color 15 3-6 grams of drops kid-silk color 18 gauge 30 sts x 38 row = 10 cm x 10 cm after blocking needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size materials 2 75 mm circular needles 2 instructions cast-on & cuff cast on w 42- 48 -54 m 60- 66 -72 sts using your preferred cast-on method my preferred method is the long tail cast on join to knit in the round being careful not to twist round 1 knit all sts round 2 knit all sts through the back loop this prevents the edge from curling continue in stockinette stitch knit all rounds for w 7- 8 -9 m 10- 11 -12 or desired cuff length thumb gusset increases round 1 k3 m1l k1 m1r knit to end round 2 knit all sts round 3 k3 m1l k3 m1r knit to end round 4 knit all sts round 5 k3 m1l k5 m1r knit to end round 6 knit all sts round 7 k3 m1l k7 m1r knit to end round 8 knit all sts round 9 k3 m1l k9 m1r knit to end round 10 knit all sts round 11 k3 m1l k11 m1r knit to end round 12 knit all sts you should now have a visible gusset formed for the thumb separate thumb stitches round 13 k1 cast off next 15 sts these are for the thumb knit to end of round round 14 k1 cast on 10 sts to bridge over the thumb opening continue knitting in stockinette stitch for w 4- 4 5 -5 m 5 5- 6 -6 5 cm length of the thumb to start of fingers finishing knit 1 round through the back loop this prevents the edge from curling knit 1 round normally bind off using italian bind-off or your preferred stretchy method second mitten repeat all instructions for the second mitten since there are no fingers to these mittens the right and left are worked the same way 3
